Package org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common.project

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BaseActionProvider.Callback
    Callback for accessing project private data.
    BaseActionProvider.Callback2
    Callback for accessing project private data and supporting ant invocation hooks.
    BaseActionProvider.Callback3
    Callback for accessing project private data and supporting ant invocation hooks.
    JavaActionProvider.Action  
    JavaActionProvider.AntTargetInvocationListener  
    JavaActionProvider.Builder.CustomFileExecutor  
    ProjectOperations.Callback
    Callback for project operations.
    ProjectPlatformProvider
    A provider of project's active JavaPlatform.
    PropertyEvaluatorProvider
    An optional interface which implementation can be provided in the project's Lookup to allow access to project's PropertyEvaluator.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseActionProvider
    Action provider which was originally written for J2SE project and later refactored here so that other EE project types requiring handling of Java related actions can reuse and extend it.
    BaseActionProvider.CallbackImpl  
    JavaActionProvider
    The simple ActionProvider for Java based project.
    JavaActionProvider.Builder  
    JavaActionProvider.Context  
    JavaActionProvider.ScriptAction  
    JavaActionProvider.ScriptAction.Result  
    MultiModuleActionProviderBuilder
    A builder of ActionProvider for Multi Module project.
    ProjectConfigurations
    Support for ProjectConfigurations in Ant based project.
    ProjectConfigurations.Configuration
    The ProjectConfiguration implementation.
    ProjectConfigurations.ConfigurationProviderBuilder
    Builder for ProjectConfigurationProvider.
    ProjectHooks
    Factory methods for creating ProjectOpenedHook and ProjectXmlSavedHook implementations.
    ProjectHooks.ProjectOpenedHookBuilder
    The builder for default Ant project ProjectOpenedHook implementation.
    ProjectHooks.ProjectXmlSavedHookBuilder
    The builder for default Ant project ProjectXmlSavedHook implementation.
    ProjectOperations
    Support for default project operations for Ant based project.
    ProjectOperations.ProjectOperationsBuilder
    The builder for projects operations.
    ProjectProperties
    Helper class.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    JavaActionProvider.CompileOnSaveOperation  
    ProjectOperations.Callback.Operation
    The type of project operation.
